entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
